title: PCE report: Inflation data cools in September – how will it affect the December Fed interest rate decision?
description: PCE report: US core inflation in September cooled slightly, falling below expectations and bolstering President Trump's call for interest rate reductions. This softer data, released after a government shutdown delay, strengthens the argument for the Federal R…
